verses.verse: Brethren <WG80>, even if1437, 2532 a man <WG444> be overtaken <WG4301> in <WG1722> any <WG5100> trespass <WG3900>, ye <WG5210> who are <WG3588> spiritual <WG4152>, restore <WG2675> such a one <WG5108> in <WG1722> a spirit <WG4151> of gentleness <WG4236>; looking <WG4648> to thyself <WG4572>, lest <WG3361> thou <WG4771> also <WG2532> be tempted <WG3985>.
Bear ye <WG941> one another <WG240>'s burdens <WG922>, and <WG2532> so <WG3779> fulfil <WG378> the law <WG3551> of Christ <WG5547>.
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> a man <WG5100> thinketh <WG1380> himself to be <WG1511> something <WG5100> when he is <WG5607> nothing <WG3367>, he deceiveth <WG5422> himself <WG1438>.

But <WG1161> let <WG1381> each man <WG1538> prove <WG1381> his own <WG1438> work <WG2041>, and <WG2532> then <WG5119> shall he have <WG2192> his glorying <WG2745> in <WG1519> regard of himself <WG1438> alone <WG3441>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> of <WG1519> his neighbor <WG2087>.
For <WG1063> each man <WG1538> shall bear <WG941> his own <WG2398> burden <WG5413>.
But let <WG2727> him that <WG3588> is taught <WG2727> in the word <WG3056> communicate <WG2841> unto him that <WG3588> teacheth <WG2727> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> good things <WG18>.

Be <WG4105> not <WG3361> deceived <WG4105>; God <WG2316> is <WG3456> not <WG3756> mocked <WG3739>: for <WG1063> whatsoever <WG1437> a man <WG444> soweth <WG4687>, that <WG5124> shall he <WG2325> also <WG2532> reap <WG2325>.

For <WG3754> he that <WG3588> soweth <WG4687> unto <WG1519> his <WG1438> own flesh <WG4561> shall <WG2325> of <WG1537> the flesh <WG4561> reap <WG2325> corruption <WG5356>; but <WG1161> he that <WG3588> soweth <WG4687> unto <WG1519> the Spirit <WG4151> shall <WG2325> of <WG1537> the Spirit <WG4151> reap <WG2325> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>.
And <WG1161> let us <WG1573> not <WG3361> be weary <WG1573> in <WG2570> well-doing <WG4160>: for <WG1063> in due <WG2398> season <WG2540> we shall reap <WG2325>, if we faint <WG1590> not <WG3361>.

So then <WG3767>, as <WG5613> we have <WG2192> opportunity <WG2540>, let us work <WG2038> that which is good <WG18> toward <WG4314> all <WG3956> men <WG1161>, and especially <WG3122> toward <WG4314> them that are <WG3588> of the household <WG3609> of the faith <WG4102>.
See <WG1492> with how large <WG4080> letters <WG1121> I write <WG1125> unto you <WG5213> with mine own <WG1699> hand <WG5495>.

As many as <WG3745> desire <WG2309> to make a fair show <WG2146> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, they <WG3778> compel <WG315> you <WG5209> to be circumcised <WG4059>; only <WG3440> that <WG2443> they may <WG3361> not be persecuted <WG1377> for the cross <WG4716> of Christ <WG5547>.

For <WG1063> not <WG3761> even they <WG3588> who <WG3588> receive circumcision <WG4059> do themselves <WG846> keep <WG5442> the law <WG3551>; but <WG235> they desire <WG2309> to have <WG4059> you <WG5209> circumcised <WG4059>, that <WG2443> they may glory <WG2744> in <WG1722> your <WG5212> flesh <WG4561>.

But <WG1161> far <WG3361> be it from me <WG1698> to <WG1096> glory <WG1487>, save <WG3361> in <WG1722> the cross <WG4716> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, through <WG1223> which <WG3739> the world <WG2889> hath been crucified <WG4717> unto me <WG1698>, and I <WG2504> unto the world <WG2889>.
For <WG1063> neither <WG3777> is <WG2480> circumcision <WG4061> anything <WG5100>, nor <WG3777> uncircumcision <WG203>, but <WG235> a new <WG2537> creature <WG2937>.

And <WG2532> as many as <WG3745> shall walk <WG4748> by this <WG5129> rule <WG2583>, peace <WG1515> be upon <WG1909> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> mercy <WG1656>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the Israel <WG2474> of God <WG2316>.

Henceforth <WG3064>, let <WG3930> no man <WG3367> trouble <WG2873> me <WG3427>; for <WG1063> I <WG1473> bear <WG941> branded on <WG1722> my <WG3450> body <WG4983> the marks <WG4742> of <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424>.
The grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with <WG3326> your <WG5216> spirit <WG4151>, brethren <WG80>. Amen <WG281>.
